actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain synthetic staple fibers that are not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain synthetic staple fibers that are not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain synthetic staple fibers that are not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning.
